name: Laundry Escape
description:
Objective

Clear the level by pressing the arrow keys to escape the washing machine before the timer runs out.

Controls: 

Arrow keys / WASD -- click the corresponding key when an arrow lights up Ex. A for left blue arrow in the level

ESC -- pause menu 

This game was made for Godot Wild Jam #37. The theme was "Inside the machine". 

Design and code by M01001. 

Design and 2D sprites by noiryt. 

Music by Will Legacy.

NOT TESTED ON MAC OR LINUX

Developed on Godot v3.3 Windows
